amendment.description: Amendment sought to amend the Upper Mississippi River-Illinois Water Way Project to allow construction of new locks only if certain requirements are met.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 109-160 to allow construction of locks and dams to proceed only if 35 million tons of commodities are processed on average for 2007-2009 and requiring the implementation of an appointment system to schedule and prioritize barge traffic, a notification report, and a re-evaluation report.
